name: nysc-daura-zone-ops
description: A workplace application for Zonal and Local Government Inspectors of the NYSC Daura zone.

scripts.build: esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/main.js --loader:.tsx=tsx --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || :
